assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Al-Babtain Power and Telecommunication Co. provides solutions for power and telecommunications infrastructure in Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates through Towers And Metal Structures Sector; Poles And Lighting; Design, Supply, And Installation Sector; and Solar Energy Sector segments. It offers outdoor lighting products, including functional, decorative, flag, mid hinged, and traffic poles; and high masts, HID and LED street lighting, and flood and obstruction lighting products. The company also manufactures transmission and distribution towers, and poles for electric utilities. In addition, it offers broadcasting towers, guyed masts, telecommunication monopoles, self-support triangular and square towers, rapid deployment vehicles, camouflage classic tubes and monopoles, rapid deployment vehicles, and penetrating and non-penetrating rooftops. Further, the company offers CSP support steel structures, PV fix structures, PV solar tracker components, and solar carports. Additionally, it is involved in the supplying, installing, and maintaining communication systems; production of mobile metal components for solar photovoltaic energy tracking systems; and production of galvanized communication towers and galvanized steel structures. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jawad Jameel Ismail Abu Shehadeh
